full_summary:
### Document No. cb-420-79296995
#### Amendment No: 6
A Request for Proposal (RFP) notice from the Department of National Defence (DND) is announced for the supply of Cartridge 12 Gauge Shotgun 2 ¾ Inch, Rifled Slug, 1 Oz Ammunition to the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF).

#### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: cb-420-79296995
* **Publication Date**: 04-12-2023
* **Closing Date**: 15-02-2024 14:00:00
* **Contracting Entity Name**: DGLEPM/DLP
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A0K2, Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Trevor Clark
	+ **Email**: Trevor.Clark@forces.gc.ca
	+ **Phone**: (613) 698-5046

#### Requirements

* **Description**: The DND requires 800,000 cartridges: 300,000 to be delivered to the Canadian Forces Ammunition Depot (CFAD) Dundurn, Saskatchewan, and 500,000 to CFAD Angus, Milton, Ontario. The cartridges will be used by the Shotgun 12 GA Remington Model 870P for animal control and the Benelli M-4 Super 90 for Explosive Ordnance Disposal (EOD).
* **Quantity**: 800,000 cartridges
* **Unit of Issue**: Each, per cartridge
* **Delivery Deadline**: 01 March 2025

#### Security Requirements

No security requirements are associated with this procurement.

#### Controlled Goods

This procurement may be subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

#### Tender Status

Please note that the tender is Expiré (Expired).

#### Trade Agreement

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Procurement Category

* **Category**: GD
* **Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

#### Selection Criteria

The lowest price will be the selection criterion.

#### Attachment

The RFP notice and amendments can be downloaded from the following link:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26577/rfp-cartridge%2C-12-gauge-shotgun-2-34-inch%2C-rifled-slug%2C-1-oz- 

Note that the above has been reformatted and rephrased
